subject: Hockey, Ice
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The league is looking into the contract of Marc Savard of the Boston Bruins after voiding one with a similar structure that went to Ilya Kovalchuk of the New Jersey Devils.
snippet: The league is looking into the contract of Marc Savard of the Boston Bruins after voiding one with a similar structure that went to Ilya Kovalchuk of the New Jersey Devils.
